title: Picnic Spots in Gurgaon
text:
0 
Are you looking for perfect locales near Delhi to have a weekend picnic and a fascinating spree around the place? Well, the adjacent places to Delhi offer loads of attractions and picnic spots. Places like Gurgaon serve as an ideal picnic spot where you enjoy to the fullest with your friends and family. 
Gurgaon is often connoted as a financial and industrial hub of the country. However, you would be surprised to know that it is also a fascinating city and perfect place for picnics. The picnic spots in Gurgaon and other places near Delhi can give you some of the most exotic experiences. 
Have a wonderful day-tour in Gurgaon 
So, if you are looking for a delightful place for an entertaining weekend getaway or picnic spots near Delhi, then Gurgaon would best. Here, you would never like to miss the wonderful cityscape and its beautiful parks while you are on day outing. This destination receives influx of day-trippers, friends' groups and families who come over in the weekends to have fabulous picnics and get-togethers. So have a look at some of the stunning outing spots to have a pleasant day picnic in Gurgaon and an enchanting excursion. 
Park of Gurgaon 
Though Gurgaon is full of skyscrapers and multi-storeyed buildings, yet there are plenty of green zones where you can take your family and friends for fun. The Tau Devi Lal Biodiversity Botanical Garden in Gurgaon and the HUDA gardens are some well known parks for day tours here. 
Damdama Lake 
Damdama Lake, very close to Gurgaon, is a very wonderful and thrilling outing spot, which remain crowded almost throughout the year. The picnic spot situated on the lap of Aravalli range is the biggest lake of Haryana. While you are out on day trip here, you can enjoy boating, hot ballooning and other water activities. 
Sultanpur Lake Bird Sanctuary 
Well, the Sultanpur Lake Bird Sanctuary which is an upgraded national park can then be your next outing destination near Gurgaon. After a sumptuous wholesome weekend brunch, you can choose spending rest of the day here. 
Sohna 
This famed tourist destination is located on the Aravalli hills. This is one of the most popular and crowded picnic spots near Delhi where you can have a relaxing day out. 
Pataudi Palace 
The palace of Nawab Mansur Ali Khan, which is very close to Gurgaon, is another striking picnic destination close to Delhi. This place stays thronged by day-trippers on the weekends. 
Historical sites 
Why not include the amazing historic spots in your day trip near Delhi? Make the day fulfilling, engaging and amazing by exploring the 18th Century's Farukh Nagar Fort, Sheesh Mahal and Qutub Khan's Tomb. 
Kingdom of Dreams 
The lovely place attracts scores of people to its live entertainment and theme restaurant. No wonder, this beautiful leisure destination must be included in your jaunt. 
iSKATE 
The ice skating arena, connoted as iSKATE, is the most captivating summer picnic destination in Gurgaon. While you have a hearty chat here, your kids can enjoy the games. 
Amusement parks 
You can also complete your day excursion with world-class amusement parks as well as water parks in Gurgaon. Among the most popular amusement parts, Aapno Ghar Amusement Park, Wet 'n' Wild, etc. are special.
